pages.title: The Forbidden Fusion
pages.text: Hybrids are the ultimate evolution, merging the strengths of both Vampires and Werewolves. Only a **powerful Original Vampire** can create them.

pages.title: Creating a Hybrid
pages.text:
A Vampire must: 
- Drain the blood of a **Werewolf**. 
- Feed the werewolf **Hybrid Blood**. 
- Force the transformation during a **Full Moon**.

pages.title: Hybrid Strengths
pages.text: - No weaknesses to Sunlight or Silver. \n- Enhanced regeneration. \n- Mastery over both **Vampire** and **Werewolf abilities**.

pages.title: Hybrid Skill Tree
pages.text: Unlock **Hybrid Dominance**, **Overpowering Might**, and **Immortal Adaptation** in the **Hybrid Skill Tree**.
